metadata.title: CVE-2017-5836 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: The plist_free_data function in plist.c in libplist allows attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via vectors involving an integer node that is treated as a PLIST_KEY and then triggers an invalid free.

criterions.comment: libplist package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.12+git+1+e37ca00-0.3').
